title: Just waited over an Hour for a Ranked Game.
body: 45 Minute + Que for a ranked game, Then 20 Minutes because I afk'd when we had a troll on our team. Oh, and if I wanted to Reset the Que for some reason, the 20 minutes I waited wouldn't even count. What a Joke. Proof:  http://imgur.com/4GJLksE

replies.body: I have been getting 100min queues .. impossible to play

I find this strange in the community because I always seem to find games within 2-3 minutes. On the rare occasion of  it taking any longer, I just restart queue and it works from there. That's just me though. I don't know about other people's luck.

I gather it's largely an issue in Bronze (though I'm not totally sure why as B theoretically has the highest pop, it could be something to do with the lack of supports?) so if you're Silver+ it likely isn't affecting you.

I just waited over an hour, had someone fail to lock in during select, gave up at lunch, then waited over an hour again (on star this time!)

[Proof](http://imgur.com/xEnVYQw)

Jungle + Mid

The 2 roles every bronzie wants, but they all complain when it takes ages because no one is taking the other roles.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EPgXoFaI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-27T09:05:50.917+0000)
>
> Jungle + Mid
> 
> The 2 roles every bronzie wants, but they all complain when it takes ages because no one is taking the other roles.

My selections are Mid/Sup.. and I gave up at 99 mins queue
People in Bronze have been having really long queue times. Try using dynamic queue.
Yeah i just waited 20 minutes for a game full of toxics. :/
